questions.questionLabel: What is a component in Angular?
Explain the purpose of the NgModule in Angular.
How do you create a new Angular application?
What is the difference between HTML and CSS?
Explain the concept of responsive design.
What is JavaScript, and how is it used in web development?
What is a linked list, and how does it differ from an array?
Explain the concept of a binary tree.
What is a hash table, and how is it used?
What is the OSI model in networking?
Explain the difference between TCP and UDP.
What is a subnet mask, and why is it important?

answers.answerLabel: A reusable building block for the user interface
A service for handling HTTP requests
NgModule is used to declare and configure modules in Angular applications.
NgModule is a directive in Angular.
You can create a new Angular application using the Angular CLI by running 'ng new app-name'.
You can create a new Angular application using pure JavaScript.
HTML is used for structuring content, while CSS is used for styling it.
CSS is used for structuring content, while HTML is used for styling it.
Responsive design ensures a website looks good on all devices by using flexible layouts.
Responsive design is only about using media queries.
JavaScript is a programming language used to create dynamic and interactive effects on web pages.
JavaScript is used for styling web pages.
A linked list is a linear data structure where elements are linked using pointers, unlike arrays which have contiguous memory locations.
A linked list is a type of array.
A binary tree is a tree data structure where each node has at most two children.
A binary tree is a linear data structure.
A hash table is a data structure that maps keys to values for efficient lookup.
A hash table is used for sorting data.
The OSI model is a conceptual framework used to understand network interactions in seven layers.
The OSI model is a protocol used for internet connections.
TCP is connection-oriented, while UDP is connectionless.
TCP is faster than UDP because it doesn't require a connection.
A subnet mask divides an IP address into network and host parts, crucial for routing.
A subnet mask is used to encrypt data.
